item.description:
One of our members, Pam, has graciously offered her home and fenced-in yard for our January Meetup. Pam is not available on the first Saturday, so this month's Meetup is on the second Saturday. The dogs are welcome to play in or out, as Pam's house is puppy proof. Pam says she will have coffee cake, coffee, tea, and hot chocolate for everyone. And plenty of dog treats too.

If you would like directions, please email me and I will send them to you.

Hope to see you there!
Laura & Molly

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel January Meetup
